sometimes i think i should get out and exercise more.

i am married with 2 children.

content.text: Hey there, what do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer and I also work on a gaming startup in my spare time.
That's cool, I'm a software engineer too. I work in a bank.
I'm surprised you have time to work on a gaming startup!
Well, I mostly work on it on the weekends. But I also enjoy it, so it's not really a chore.
That's great, I wish I had more time to work on my startup.
It's a multiplayer online game. I'm hoping to release it by the end of the year.
That's really cool, I hope it does well!
Thanks! I'm really excited about it.
Me too! I'm always looking for new games to play.
Well, if you're interested, I can send you a link to the beta when it's ready.
